targets.root_selector:
def hex2int:
  ascii_downcase | explode
  | reduce .[] as $c (0; . * 16 + (("0123456789abcdef"|explode) | index($c)));

.result
| ltrimstr("0x")
| .[0:64] as $w
| [ { Current: ($w | hex2int) } ]

def hex2int:
  ascii_downcase | explode
  | reduce .[] as $c (0; . * 16 + (("0123456789abcdef"|explode) | index($c)));

.result
| ltrimstr("0x")
| .[0:64] as $w
| [ { count: ($w | hex2int) } ]
